Description: Green(now discoloured) glazed composition shabti of the God's Father of Amun, Bakenkhons, with purple detail: a lappet-wig tied with a fillet, a modelled face and joined hands in relief holding two hoes; the leg section bears a column of Hieroglyphic text; seed-basket on the back; repaired at knee level.
Curator's comments: The collection contains three other shabtis of the same man (EA 54839, 68606 and 71104). The collection also includes five shabtis in a different style of a God's Father and God's Servant of Amun, Bakkhons, who was probably a different individual (EA 50106, 50107, 71108, 71154 and 71156).
